data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Middle to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Middle, Isle of Man
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Middle, Isle of Man to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 14,878 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Middle, Isle of Man to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 24,072 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Onchan
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Onchan, Middle, Isle of Man.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Middle, Isle of Man from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Middle, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Middle, Isle of Man has a population of 26,300.

We estimate Middle has 2,228 people who might know Jesus, 14,878 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,194 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Middle, Isle of Man.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
